title: Shrimp and Teriyaki Steak
description: Grilled shrimp and steak glazed with teriyaki sauce and served with steamed vegetables.

title: Five-Flavored Seafood and Steak
description: Crab meat, scallop, shrimp, and grilled steak with fresh vegetables in a five-flavored sauce.

title: Happy Family
description: Shrimp, scallop, crab meat, beef, chicken, pork, with fresh vegetables sauteed in a brown sauce.

title: Five-Flavored Scallop and Beef
description: Scallops, beef, and vegetables sauteed in five-flavored sauce.

title: Sweet & Sour Combination
description: A treat for sweet and sour lovers. Grace yourself on a combination of chicken, pork and shrimp.

title: Tsoa San Shein
description: Shrimp, chicken and beef sauteed with vegetables in a brown sauce.

title: Triple Crown
description: Shrimp, chicken and beef sauteed with vegetables in a five-flavored sauce.

title: Beef and Chicken Hunan Style
description: Sliced beef and chicken sauteed with vegetables in a brown sauce.
